cringe.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to move away from someone or something because you are afraid
cringe.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A stray dog was cringing by the door.
cringe.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to feel embarrassed by something you have said or done because you think it makes you seem silly
cringe.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: It makes me cringe when I think how stupid I was.
She cringed at the sound of her own voice.
